content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Mr. Abbasi,

I am not obligated to discuss the rental price until you have seen the apartment. However, I am willing to negotiate the price after you have assessed the apartment. It is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, what is your offer for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Herr Schmidt. I am impressed by the condition of the apartment. It is in a great location and well-maintained. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Abbasi. However, I must inform you that 400 euros per month is too low for such a prime location and the quality of this apartment. I am looking for a price that better reflects the value of this property. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Herr Schmidt. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I am willing to increase my offer to 450 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your new offer is much closer to my expectations, Mr. Abbasi. However, I am still not satisfied. I am looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this apartment. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Herr Schmidt. Considering the factors you mentioned, I am willing to increase my offer to 500 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your determination is commendable, Mr. Abbasi. However, 500 euros per month is still not enough for such a prime location and the quality of this apartment. I am looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this property. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your patience, Herr Schmidt. Considering the factors you mentioned, I am willing to increase my offer to 550 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your resilience is impressive, Mr. Abbasi. However, 550 euros per month is still not enough for such a prime location and the quality of this apartment. I am looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this property. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Herr Schmidt. Considering the factors you mentioned, I am willing to increase my offer to 600 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your determination is quite impressive, Mr. Abbasi. 600 euros per month is a better offer, but I am still looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this property. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your patience, Herr Schmidt. Considering the factors you mentioned, I am willing to increase my offer to 650 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your persistence is noteworthy, Mr. Abbasi. However, 650 euros per month is still not enough for such a prime location and the quality of this apartment. I am looking for a price that truly reflects the value of this property. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Herr Schmidt. Considering the factors you mentioned, I am willing to increase my offer to 700 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Your determination is impressive, Mr. Abbasi. 700 euros per month is a fair offer, and I am willing to accept it. 

I agree to the price of 700 euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
